Pre-Game Insights: The match between France and Belgium at Euro 2024 is expected to significantly impact the economy, with cafes, bars, and restaurants being the major beneficiaries.
The match will take place on Monday, July 1, 2024.
Belgian supporters are relieved as the match will be held in Dusseldorf, which is only 200 kilometers from Brussels, allowing many to travel back and forth on the same day.
